channel.title: Winter Village needs immortal shinobis
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Winter Village needs immortal shinobis"

item.title: Re: Winter Village needs immortal shinobis
item.content:encoded:
Perhaps many of the people who already have StI are already in an IR.

Don't forget that people can apply if they are Chuunin+ as well.

Do your former villagers know of your IR yet?

item.title: Re: Winter Village needs immortal shinobis
item.content:encoded:
Aren't there any shinobis who don't have a immortal village yet but like to get +30 Stamina more a day?

Is it not enough attractive or are there just no shinobis around?

item.title: Winter Village needs immortal shinobis
item.content:encoded:
Hi Everyone

the former Manifest Village is gone. The Kaiju Drizz is no in a cold place at the end of the world.

Winter Village, the Village hidden in the snow.

We have a lot of stuff (kaijudrops included) for the new ones, but we need people to grow again. So just come over to Winter Village if u have survived the impossible already.

I'd be happy to welcome u :)

See u soon
The Drizz
